Class MockDataProvider

java.lang.Object
New_Additions.MockDataProvider
public class MockDataProvider extends Object
MockDataProvider provides mock data for testing and development purposes. This class simulates database operations when a real database connection is not available.
Since:
2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
harry

    Constructs a new MockDataProvider and initializes mock data.

    • getAllMenuItems

      public List<MenuItem> getAllMenuItems()
      Retrieves all mock menu items.

      List of MenuItem objects containing all mock menu items

    • addMenuItem

      public boolean addMenuItem(MenuItem item)
      Adds a new menu item to the mock data.
      Parameters:
      item - the MenuItem object to be added
      Returns:
      always true for mock data operations

    • updateMenuItemPrice

      public boolean updateMenuItemPrice(int menuItemId, double newPrice)
      Updates the price of a menu item in mock data.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the ID of the menu item to update
      newPrice - the new price for the menu item
      Returns:
      true if menu item was found and updated, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date for sales calculation
      endDate - the end date for sales calculation
      Returns:
      total sales amount for the specified date range

      always true for mock data operations

      Returns:

    • validateInventoryForOrder

      public boolean validateInventoryForOrder(List<OrderItem> orderItems)
      Validates if there's sufficient inventory for an order in mock data mode.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of OrderItem objects to validate
      Returns:
      true if sufficient inventory exists, false otherwise

    • updateInventoryForOrder

      public boolean updateInventoryForOrder(List<OrderItem> orderItems)
      Updates inventory for an order in mock data mode.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of OrderItem objects from the completed order
      Returns:
      true if inventory update was successful, false otherwise
